name: TOYOTA PRIUS SPECS
description: The Petrol engine is 1798 cc . It is available with Automatic transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Prius has a mileage of 26.27 kmpl & Ground clearance of Prius is 135mm. The Prius is a 5 seater 4 cylinder car and has length of 4540mm, width of 1760mm and a wheelbase of 2700m
